reviews.review_msg: I highly recommend this prof. I had him for HUM 360 and HUM387 in the same term. His assignments are straightforward and enjoyable as they give you flexibility to relate interests to the course content. He is a bit slow at returning marks. However, his lectures are interesting, very knowledgeable, and he cares about his students.
He's such a cutie patootie, he's just a bit slow with marking but he's so passionate about what he teaches and is just an overall amazing guy.
